DOC.brief_summary: A study comparing the early withdrawal of steroids to long-term maintenance steroid therapy in Kidney Transplant Patients receiving Prograf and Cellcept
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare Early Steroid Withdrawal and Long-Term Steroid Maintenance Therapy in Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Patient is between post kidney transplant day 37 and no requirement for dialysis Exclusion: Patient is receiving kidney from HLA identical,living donor Patient is a multiorgan transplant recipient Patient is pregnant or lactating. Female patients of child bering potential must have a negative pregnancy test and agree to practice effective birth control
